\begin{question}
Which of the following are legal? For those that are illegal, explain why.
\begin{enumerate}[label=(\alph*)]
^^I\item const int buf;
^^I\item int cnt = 0;
^^I\item const int sz = cnt;
^^I\item ++cnt; ++sz;
\end{enumerate}
\end{question}
